main event: A glowing blue and white light was observed moving slowly and then disappearing to the northwest.
interesting points: Sighting occurred on November 20, 1954, 130 miles southwest of New Orleans, LA., The observation lasted between 3 to 5 minutes., The sighting was recorded as having blue and white lights that were glowing and flashing., A pilot involved in the sighting concluded that the object was definitely a star., Various conclusions were drawn regarding the object suggesting it could be a balloon or astronomical phenomenon.
location: 130 miles SW of New Orleans, LA
